name: LineSecurity
title: Line Security
description: Line Security codes for insurance operations.

concept.definition: ULC-certified alarm system with direct connection to a central monitoring station with 24-hour supervision and immediate response capability.

designation.value: Protection de la ligne de niveau I

concept.definition: ULC-certified alarm system with direct connection to a central monitoring station with supervision during business hours only.

designation.value: Protection de la ligne de niveau II

concept.definition: ULC-certified alarm system connected to a central monitoring station via telephone line or cellular communication.

designation.value: Protection de la ligne de niveau III

concept.definition: ULC-certified local alarm system that sounds on-site but is not monitored by a central station.

designation.value: Protection de la ligne de niveau IV

concept.definition: ULC-certified smoke detectors without connection to a monitoring service or alarm system.

designation.value: Protection de la ligne de niveau V

concept.definition: ULC-certified fire extinguishers or other basic fire safety equipment without detection or alarm capabilities.

designation.value: Protection de la ligne de niveau VI

concept.definition: Minimal or no certified fire protection equipment present.

designation.value: Protection de la ligne de niveau VII

concept.definition: Fire protection equipment or alarm system present but not certified by Underwriters Laboratories of Canada.
